name: Billy
title: PlantCon
message: Does anyone have an extra ticket for both days?

name: Jill
title: Meeting
message: Would everyone possibly consider moving the set meeting times 30 minutes earlier? It's tough to make it to the meetings on time right after work.

name: Tim
title: Great Species
message: I really think succulents are overlooked and should be considered essentials by all houseplant owners.
